title: Boston Ballet's Nissinen on William Forsythe Partnership(Audio)
itunes:title: Boston Ballet's Nissinen on William Forsythe Partnership(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Mikko Nissinen, Artistic Director at the Boston Ballet, on their new partnership with internationally renowned Choreographer William Forsythe. Broadcasting live from the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
